changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO consent (consent_id, external_id, consent_type, consent_status, expire_date, valid_until, frequency_per_day, multilevel_sca_required, recurring_indicator, internal_request_id, creation_timestamp, last_action_date, request_date_time, status_change_timestamp, authorisation_template_id, consent_tpp_information_id, checksum, instance_id) SELECT consent.id, consent.external_id, consent.consent_type, consent.consent_status, consent.expire_date, consent.valid_until, consent.expected_frequency_per_day as frequency_per_day, consent.multilevel_sca_required, consent.recurring_indicator, consent.int_req_id as internal_request_id, consent.creation_timestamp, consent.last_action_date, consent.request_date_time, consent.status_change_timestamp, consent.authorisation_template_id, info.consent_tpp_information_id, consent.checksum, consent.instance_id from ais_consent consent INNER JOIN consent_tpp_information info ON consent.id = info.consent_id
